title: Volume effect on vapor pressure - closed system

content.prompt: Which of the following statements is true for the equilibrium vapor pressure of a liquid in a closed system?

choices.label: It remains constant when the temperature increases.
It decreases to half its original value if the volume of the gas phase is doubled.
It increases to twice its original value if the volume of the liquid phase is doubled.
It is independent of the volume of the vapor phase.
